```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggbeeswarm)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(viridis)

#windowsFonts(Arial = windowsFont("Arial"))

# Defines a colorblind-friendly palette
cbPalette <- c("#C10028","#6C5C00","#00952A","#0092FF","#FF00EB","#F67D00","#27CC00","#00E9FB","#F2BAFF","#FFDEE5")

# Imports dataset called "combined" that has the columns "replicate," "variable," and "value"
p50_BZ_width <- read.csv("BZ_width.csv")
p50_BZ_width <- p50_BZ_width
p50_BZ_width <- p50_BZ_width[!is.na(p50_BZ_width$Width),]

decoder <- read.csv("Decoder_ODP_CTNND2_p50.csv")

```

```{r}
# Orders the variables on x-axis
p50_BZ_width$Random.Name <- p50_BZ_width$Label

p50_BZ_width_decoded <- merge(p50_BZ_width, decoder, by = 'Random.Name')

p50_BZ_width <- data.frame(animal = p50_BZ_width_decoded$Animal,
                     genotype = p50_BZ_width_decoded$Genotype,
                     sex = p50_BZ_width_decoded$Sex,
                     condition = p50_BZ_width_decoded$Condition,
                     width = p50_BZ_width_decoded$Length)
p50_BZ_width$animal <- factor(p50_BZ_width$animal)
p50_BZ_width$genotype <- factor(p50_BZ_width$genotype)
```

```{r stats}
library(FSA)

  Summarize(width ~ genotype + condition,
          data=p50_BZ_width,
          digits=3)
```

```{r}
library(car)
model = lm(width ~ genotype + condition + genotype:condition,
           data = p50_BZ_width)
summary(model)

Anova(model, type = "II")
```

```{r t-tests}
p50_BZ_width$genotype_condition <- paste(p50_BZ_width$genotype, p50_BZ_width$condition)

p50_BZ_width$width_norm <- p50_BZ_width$width / mean(p50_BZ_width[p50_BZ_width$genotype_condition == "WT NR",]$Width)

p50_BZ_width$genotype_condition <- factor(p50_BZ_width$genotype_condition, levels = c("WT NR", "WT MD", "HET NR", "HET MD", "KO NR", "KO MD"))

ReplicateAverages <- p50_BZ_width %>% group_by(genotype, animal, condition, genotype_condition) %>%
  summarise(width = mean(width))
ReplicateAverages

# Gives the p-value for the t-Test of width and genotype
#ttest1 <- t.test(width  ~ genotype, data = p50_BZ_width, alternative = "two.sided", var.equal = TRUE, conf.level = 0.95)
#ttest1p <- ttest1[["p.value"]]
#ttest1
#ttest1p

# Gives the p-value for the t-Test of width and condition
ttest2 <- t.test(width  ~ condition, data = p50_BZ_width, alternative = "two.sided", var.equal = TRUE, conf.level = 0.95)
ttest2p <- ttest2[["p.value"]]
ttest2
ttest2p

# Calculates total averages
TotalAverages <- ReplicateAverages %>% group_by(genotype, condition, genotype_condition) %>%  summarise(width = mean(width))
TotalAverages
```

```{r}
# Plots Superplot based on biological replicate averages

superplot_p50 <- ggplot(p50_BZ_width, aes(x=genotype_condition,y=width,color=factor(animal))) +

  # Adds individual data points
  geom_quasirandom(size=2, alpha = 1/2) +
  
  # Adds mean values as bars
  stat_summary(data = TotalAverages, fun = mean, fun.min = mean, fun.max = mean,
               geom = "bar", width = 0.8, color = "gray", alpha = 0.5) +
  # Adds error bars
  stat_summary(data = ReplicateAverages, fun.data = mean_se,
               geom = "errorbar", width = 0.1, color = "black") +
          
  # Adds color palette
  #scale_colour_manual(7) +
  
  # Adds Replicative averages as points (argument "cex" can be used to spread the data points if the averages are close together)
  geom_point(data=ReplicateAverages, size=5) +
  
  #Cosmetics and labeling
  theme(
    legend.text = element_text(size = 6),
    legend.title = element_text(size = 8), 
  ) +
    ggtitle ("Binocular zone width (um)") + xlab("") + ylab("Width (um)") +
    scale_colour_manual(values = cbPalette) + scale_fill_manual(values = cbPalette)
ppi = 300
superplot_p50
ggsave(filename = "ctnnd2_ko_v_ctrl_superplot_p50.png", width = 5, height = 3)


```
